title: Greenpeace voyages to save the whales
creator_credit: Greenpeace Film Productions and Michael Chechik
brief_description: Documents the efforts of the Greenpeace organisation to stop the slaughter of the great whales. Shows whaling fleets and processing. IWC meetings are filmed.
